values.desc: Retrieves whether the accessibility button in the system's navigation area is available to the calling service.
Registers the provided AccessibilityButtonCallback for interaction and state changes callbacks related to the accessibility button.
Registers the provided AccessibilityButtonCallback for interaction and state change callbacks related to the accessibility button.
Unregisters the provided AccessibilityButtonCallback for interaction and state change callbacks related to the accessibility button.
Callback for interaction with and changes to state of the accessibility button within the system's navigation area.
